properties.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 17 at 8:47PM CST until January 18 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Aberdeen SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations
of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze.
Winds gusting as high as 55 mph.

* WHERE...Potter County.

* WHEN...Until 3 PM CST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could
bring down tree branches. The cold wind chills as low as 30
below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little
as 30 minutes.
properties.instruction:
Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must
travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded,
stay with your vehicle.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM CST THIS EVENING
